name: Perma-Rock Products, Inc. v. Perma-Stone Co.
name_abbreviation: Perma-Rock Products, Inc. v. Perma-Stone Co.

court.name: United States Court of Customs and Patent Appeals

parties: Perma-Rock Products, Inc. v. Perma-Stone Co.

opinions.text: Trademark for aggregate material in powdered or granular form for use as a filler, body or other purpose in the industrial arts.

casebody.head_matter:
March 6, 1957
Perma-Rock Products, Inc. v. Perma-Stone Co.
(No. 6324).
